doc:
Aimé Clariond https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aim%C3%A9_Clariond 0 Aimé Clariond (10 April 1894 – 1 January 1959) was a French stage and film actor. He was in a relationship with the mother of Catherine Deneuve, Renée Simonot, and was the father of Catherine's half-sister Danielle (born 1936). Clariond was born in Périgueux, Dordogne, France and died in Paris. Aimé_Clariond ( 10_April_1894 – 1_January_1959 ) was a_French_stage_and_film_actor . He was in a_relationship with the_mother of Catherine_Deneuve , Renée_Simonot , and was the_father of Catherine 's_half-sister_Danielle_( born 1936_) . Clariond was_born in Périgueux , Dordogne , France and died in Paris .
